articles.content: BTS’ new compilation album Proof debuts at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 chart (dated June 25), garnering the pop group its sixth chart-topper. The retrospective – consisting mostly of previously releas… [+6572 chars]

articles.title: 2 deputies disciplined after Bob Saget death investigation - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) — Two Florida deputies have each been suspended for about two weeks for leaking news about actor and comedian Bob Saget’s death before his family was alerted, officials said. The Orange County Sheriff's Office confirmed Monday that the two …
